subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Tests and Business Rules
msgSnippet: ... JESS.   JESS is based on CLIPS, and both use the rete pattern matcher. JESS is at: http://herzberg.ca.sandia.gov/jess/  -- Vic Williams  - process
messageBody:
Mark Derricutt wrote:


> Are there any existing patterns/frameworks for implementing rule based
> logic cleanly?
>

JESS. JESS is based on CLIPS, and both use the rete pattern matcher.


JESS is at:



http://herzberg.ca.sandia.gov/jess/


<g>
--
Vic Williams - process facilitator - (604)433-5189

Focus your awareness on a particular tree or herb near you. Do not just
look at it -- instead, merge with it, touch it, become it. Imagine you
are that plant. Imagine experiencing the world as it experiences the
world. -- Selena Fox
